2016 summary

Dec 31, 2016

[ running  triathlon  ironman-70-3  skitouring  ironman-70-3-gdynia  skitour  ]

2016 was nice year.

2016 was my first triathlon season. I fall in love with swim bike run. Took part in:

  • 4x Ironman 70.3 (Susz, Nieporƒôt, Gdynia, Lanzarote) [1.9k swim, 90k bike, 21k run]
  • 1x 5150 triathlon (Warsaw) [1.5k swim, 40k bike, 10k run]
  • 2x full marathon (Paris, Gda≈Ñsk)
  • 1x half marathon (Warsaw)
  • 1x 10k run (Warsaw)

On each distance new PB:

  • 10km: 00:40:00
  • HM: 01:39:29

  • M: 03:39:54

  • Olimpic (5150): 02:31:55
  • Ironman 70.3: 05:13:16

2016 was nice year. 2x full marathon, 1x half marathon, 1x 10k run. 1x 5150 triathlon, 4x Ironman 70.3.
